Minutes of the Regular City Council Meeting – March 6, 2023

RESULT:
YEAS:
ACCEPTED [9-0-0]
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

Minutes of the Regular City Council Meeting – March 20, 2023
RESULT:
YEAS:
ACCEPTED [9-0-0]
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

PAGE 1

Apr 3, 2023

I. CITY MANAGER'S AGENDA
1. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appointment of the
following persons as Constables With Power for a term effective January, 2023: Omar Mejia.
CMA 2023 #87
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to a Revised Response to
Proposed Amendments to Ch. 2.78, Art. III.
CMA 2023 #88
RESULT:
REFERRED TO THE PETITION [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

3. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report Item
Number 22-79, regarding Garden Street Safety Improvement Project local traffic analysis.
CMA 2023 #89
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 2

Apr 3, 2023

II. CALENDAR

CHARTER RIGHT
1. Policy Order for Garden Street Accommodations
POR 2023 #52
Councillor Toner, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Carlone
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [5-3-1-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Carlone, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Toner,
Mayor Siddiqui

NAYS:
Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Zondervan

PRESENT:
Councillor Azeem

2. That the City Council authorize an extension of time for the Special Committee/Charter Review
Committee to file its report on suggested Charter changes with the City Council until December
31, 2023.
POR 2023 #55
Councillor Nolan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [8-1-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor
McGovern, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Mayor
Siddiqui

NAYS:
Councillor Zondervan

ON THE TABLE


PAGE 3

Apr 3, 2023

UNFINISHED BUSINESS
3. An Ordinance has been received from Diane P. LeBlanc City Clerk, relative to a Zoning Petition
from Patrick Barrett et al. North Mass Ave BA-5 Zoning District Petition (Ordinance #2022-21).
ORD 2022 # 21
RESULT:
PASSED TO BE ORDAINDED AS AMENDED [6-3-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Nolan,
Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner

NAYS:
Councillor Carlone, Councillor Zondervan, Mayor Siddiqui

#44 ,related to the Barrett, et al., Zoning Petition.

PAGE 4

Apr 3, 2023

III. APPLICATIONS AND PETITIONS
1. An application was received from John Peterson representing The Turing Tavern, requesting
permission for an 3 awnings and 1 projecting sign at the premises numbered 1281 Cambridge Street.
Approval has been received from Inspectional Services, Department of Public Works, Community
Development Department and abutters.
APP 2023 #16
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. An application was received from Heather Dudko representing Citizens Bank, requesting permission
for a projecting blade sign at the premises numbered 616 Main Street approval has been received
from Inspectional Services, Department of Public Works, Community Development Department and
abutters proof of mailing had been provided.
APP 2023 #17
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

Apr 3, 2023

PAGE 35

Apr 3, 2023

VI. POLICY ORDER AND RESOLUTION LIST
1. That the City Manager is requested to work with the City Solicitor to provide a legal opinion which
clarifies the state law on zoning petition signature requirements to ensure clarity and lawful
deliberation in the future.
POR 2023 #56
Councillor Nolan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. That the City Manager is requested to work with the Department of Public Works, the Cambridge
Public Libraries, the Department of Public Health, and all other relevant departments to provide free
menstrual products in all gender bathrooms of the Cambridge Public Library branches.
POR 2023 #57
Vice Mayor Mallon, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor
McGovern, Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

3. City Council support of H.1312 and S.856, An Act Providing Upstream Homelessness Prevention
Assistance to Families, Youth, and Adults.
POR 2023 #58
Mayor Siddiqui, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

4. That the City Manager is requested to direct the Department of Human Service Programs to develop a
three-year plan to expand and improve After School Care for Cambridge children.
POR 2023 #59
Councillor McGovern, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Azeem, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor
Carlone, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 36

Apr 3, 2023

5. That the City Manager is hereby requested to direct the Community Development Department and the
Law Department to review the Citizens Zoning Petition received from Michael Monestime et al.
regarding Outdoor Use Zoning for the Central Square Cultural District (APP 2023 #12) for form and
content.
POR 2023 #60
Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

6. City Council solidarity to the Mayor, Municipal Council, and Community Council of San José Las
Flores in recognition of the successes and persistence of the community.
POR 2023 #61
Councillor Carlone
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

7. Proclaim April 3–9, 2023 as Cambridge Public Health Week.
POR 2023 #62
Mayor Siddiqui, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Councillor
Simmons, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

8. That the City Council amend rules 38.6 and 32B and rule 12., to align the City Council rules with the
decision made in Barron v. Kolenda.
POR 2023 #63
Vice Mayor Mallon
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [7-0-2-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Nolan,
Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan, Mayor Siddiqui

PRESENT:
Councillor Carlone, Councillor Simmons


PAGE 37

Apr 3, 2023
